summary: Sons of Skyrim only. This removes MOST females from the city guard and soldiers. In the time period suggested by Skyrim it would be rare that women would be found as members of the actual military or guard. Forsworn, Bandits and other Factions have not been altered as they would be more likely to have women among their numbers.
descriptionHtml:
[size=20][color=yellow]A patch for the new "Immersive Patrols II" is available in the optional files.[/color][/size]
[size=5]Also[/size]
[size=20][color=yellow]A patch for "Diverse Guards" is available under optional files..[/color][/size]

Name: Sons of Skyrim Only

Version: 1.2
Date: 09/09/2013
Category: NPCs
Author: JadeRoyale

Description
===========
Sons of Skyrim only. This removes MOST females from the city guard and soldiers. In the time period suggested by Skyrim it would be rare that women would be found as members of the actual military or guard. Forsworn, Bandits and other Factions have not been altered as they would be more likely to have women among their numbers.

Details
=======
This is just a small mod I made for my own personal use. The large number of women in the army and guards was always an issue for me. Yes, history has many stories of Shield Maidens but they were rare exceptions and not the rule. I find it hard to believe that the world of Skyrim would be any different. You may still find the occasional, although very rare, female in uniform. The only exception is I have not made any changes to Legate Rikke (or any of the women made from her model for obivious reasons). Nor do I have any plans to change that in the future. If you like it great... if not? Well, don't use it. lol. In any case, I hope you enjoy YOUR Skyrim experience. That is really the point isn't it?

Optional Files
==============
To use the optional files for Immersive Patrols or Battles you MUST first have Scrabbulor's Immersive Patrols installed. You can find it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12977/?
Remember to manually drop the optional files into your data folder. Boss will set the load order for these files.

Load Order for Sons of Skyrim Only
=================================
I have this early in my load order. Postion 20 (out of a 102 current mods). I really don't think it matters to much.

Install
=======
1. Copy the .esp file to SkyrimData
2. Start the Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the .esp file.


Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file.
2. Delete the .esp file from SkyrimData


Incompatibility
===============
No known conflicts at this time. However, this does modify guard and soldier NPC's so there is always a possiblity of conflict with similar mods. Just remember to back up your files.


History
=======
1.0, 07/06/2013
~ Initial release.
1.1, 07/18/2013
~Changed City Guard Imperial Mage to male.
~Changed Civil War Imperial Corpse (Imperial Race) to male. (Didn't make much sense to have so many dead women with so few fighting.)
~Changed Civil War Sons Corpse (Imperial Race) to male.
~Changed City Guard Stormcloak Prisoner Dead to male.
~Fixed EncGuardsons female(male) head had incorrect markers.
~Fixed EncSoldierSonsNord incorrect facial scars removed.
1.2, 09/09/2013
Version1.2
~Fixed issue causing game to hang during the execution at Helgen.

Contact
=======
You can find me on Skyrim Nexus or on Steam as 'JadeRoyale'


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating such an awesome game.


Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like to know what mods are including my work.
